text: The Red Lanterns (, translit. Ta Kokkina fanaria) is a 1963 Greek drama movie directed by Vasilis Georgiadis and was based on the play by Alekos Galanos. It stars Tzeni Karezi, Giorgos Foundas, Dimitris Papamichael, Manos Katrakis, Notis Peryalis. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1964. ==Other websites== * Category:1963 drama movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Vasilis Georgiadis
title: The Red Lanterns
